Campus Departments

List of Departments

  • Computer Science Department

    The Computer Science Department offers courses and research opportunities in computer programming, algorithms, software development, and more.

  • Information Science Department

    The Information Science Department focuses on data analysis, information retrieval, database systems, and related fields.

  • Civil Engineering Department

    The Civil Engineering Department offers programs in structural engineering, transportation, environmental engineering, and urban planning.

  • Mechanical Engineering Department

    The Mechanical Engineering Department specializes in mechanical design, thermal systems, manufacturing processes, and robotics.

  • Artificial Intelligence Department

    The Artificial Intelligence Department conducts research in machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, and AI applications.
